Name: Project Unirah
About the game: Project Unirah is a third person shooter created by a single developer using Unreal Engine 4. Player controls a highly advanced robot with an upgraded, non-standard AI matrix. Fight your way through a factory setting, learn what happened and uncover the reason for your existence. Key Features: - Fight to survive: Use your equipped weapons to eliminate hostile robots - Utilize the Gravity Gun to pass the traps and solve puzzles blocking your way - Explore the factory and learn of the tragic events that have transpired
Meta Title: Project Unirah: Dec 3, 2021, Piotr Kowalski and Full Over...
